name: TrueNAS
description: TrueNAS is the world's most deployed storage software, providing scalable unified and hyperconverged storage for valuable data while leveraging Open Source economics.

sdgs.sdg: SDG8: Decent Work and Economic Growth
sdgs.relevance:
SDG8: Free access to the TrueNAS community and open source technology provides industry connections and the ability to learn best practices in an established technology project. Through engagement, community members practice real skills that are relevant in the global job market.

SDG9: TrueNAS data storage software enables organizations and community members to deliver tailored data storage solutions for their users
[NOTE - Unable to save this as a selection using the webform]

SDG12: TrueNAS software extends the usable life of server and storage hardware beyond 3-5 years, maximizing hardware investments and delaying the destruction or recycling of that infrastructure.

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: TrueNAS collects basic non-PII system information such as software version and services enabled, hardware information, and chosen data protection configuration(s) for use in ongoing software design and testing. Non-PII data from TrueNAS systems is submitted to our usage collector agent daily vi HTTPS and is available via an internal-only webpage to iX Systems Engineering Staff, stored in a JSON format.

openStandards:
x86-64 architecture
ARM-hfp architecture
TCP/IP
HTTPS
SSL
SSH
SMB
NFS
bestPractices:
Open source software development
Upstream-first policy
Rapid iteration and feedback
User stories
Change management using version control
Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
Code review
Agile development

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

protectionFromHarassment.harassmentPolicy: Forum rules described @ https://www.truenas.com/community/threads/forum-rules.45124/. Interaction on the forums requires account registration, where date of birth is a required field used to verify registrants are 13 years of age ore older.

deploymentCountriesDepartments: TrueNAS is used by thousands of national
and local government and public bodies to store data
including numerous universities and research labs.
otherDeploymentOrganisations: TrueNAS is used by thousands of non-government
and charitable organizations to store data.

privacy.privacyCompliance:
California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (CCPA)
EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
